full_summary:
# Request for Proposal for Psychiatric Services at Correctional Service Canada

## Request Details

* **Project Title:** Psychiatric Services - Correctional Service Canada, Donnacona Institution
* **Solicitation Number:** 21301-25-4785902c
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 26, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** November 30, 2027

## Description of the Requirement

Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a licensed physician specializing in psychiatry to provide essential mental health services to offenders at the Donnacona Institution in Quebec. The chosen supplier must actively participate in the coordination of services and prepare relevant documentation in accordance with National Essential Health Services Framework guidelines.

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will focus on the following aspects:

* Compliance with the solicitation document
* Technical merits within the stipulated maximum budget
* Ability to provide high-quality psychiatric services
* Experience in collaborating with government agencies

## Conditions for Participation

* The supplier must hold a valid license to practice medicine in Canada.
* The supplier must have experience in providing psychiatric services to offenders.
* The supplier must be able to provide necessary documentation and reports in both English and French.

## Communication and Paperwork

* Suppliers can obtain the complete solicitation document and evaluation criteria from the Canada buys/tender opportunities website.
* The CSC reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* All documents can be submitted in either English or French.
* After contract award, suppliers may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

## Procurement Strategy

This procurement is open to all interested suppliers. The evaluation will be based on the highest technical merit within the stipulated maximum budget. Suppliers are responsible for familiarizing themselves with the solicitation document and its contents to ensure compliance.

## Contact Information

For further information and clarification, please contact:
Francine Marcotte
Phone: 343-598-9309
Email: [Francine.Marcotte@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Francine.Marcotte@csc-scc.gc.ca)

## Additional Resources

* Revised land claims and comprehensive trades agreements details can be found on the government's website.
* Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) offers free seminars and workshops on doing business with the government. For more information, please visit the PAC website.
